title: Already Half, Still Half
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Why do we have school today? Isn’t it weird?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Geez, I was wondering what’s going on when you called me so suddenly, Chika-san.... We have school today because it’s a weekday. It’s not weird.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>But tomorrow is also a holiday, you know? Isn’t it better to make today a holiday too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Well, I can understand why people would be happier with a longer holiday.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Because you know, I haven’t finished that thing yet....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>....By that thing, do you mean your homework....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I did half of it, okay! I’ve been doing it properly! But there’s the other half left, so I was just thinking it would be great if today is a holiday too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Chika-san.... Would you be able to finish the remaining half with just tomorrow and the day after left? You still have half, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>But I’m halfway done....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>That just means you still have half left. Let’s go work on it right now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
